relevant_findings.eye: mild photophobia, flat patches of subconjunctival hemorrhage in the left eye
relevant_findings.rash: diffuse erythematous rash, macular and nonblanching on lower legs and palms/soles, maculopapular and blanching on thighs, abdomen, chest, and arms
relevant_findings.lung: clear on auscultation but coughing with deep breathing
relevant_findings.edema: trace edema of the feet without erythema or pain
